original: Giving to others what I may need in the future is not always the best choice. I've lost the §YCharitable§! trait.
translation: 把我将来可能用得上的东西送给别人并不总是最好的选择。我失去了§Y慷慨§!特质。

original: Sometimes sharing what I have with others feels good. I've lost the §YGreedy§! trait.
translation: 与人分享是一种快乐。我失去了§Y贪婪§!特质。

original: Books are precious, as the knowledge of things past and new are written in their pages. This beacon of knowledge will have capacity to store thousands of books, and will have reading facilities.
translation: 书籍是宝贵的，有关古往今来事物的知识写在它们的字里行间。这座知识的宝库将具备储存数以千计的书籍的能力，还配有配套的阅读设备。
萨摩斯的阿斯克勒庇阿得斯
萨拉米斯的赫尔谟德鲁斯

original: [Root.GetBookThemeCap] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], that was thought to be lost forever, but was found and acquired by [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] for his Great Library.
Initially thought to be [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], it is now considered a clever forgery.
An ancient knight's armor found on a mysterious tomb.
translation: 在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的护甲。

original: An ancient knight's sword found on a mysterious tomb.
translation: 在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的佩剑。

original: An ancient scepter, adorned with many emeralds, which was found on an old king's tomb.
translation: 在一位古代君王的陵墓中发现的古老权杖，上面装饰着许多绿宝石。

original: Mostly a waste of good metal, the blacksmith who made this suit of armor was probably drunk when they did so.
translation: 基本上是对优良金属的浪费，打造它的铁匠当时很可能喝醉了。

original: A two-handed powerful but heavy sword, that can only be properly handled by a strong warrior.
translation: 一把强力但是沉重的双手剑，只有强壮的战士才能得当地使用它。

original: The §YTraining Academy§! in my §YAmphitheater§! possesses many well-trained young warriors. Maybe the best one out of them will make a good military commander.
translation: 我§Y圆形剧场§!里的§Y锻炼学院§!拥有许多训练有素的年轻勇士。或许他们当中最出色的那位可以成为一名优秀的军事指挥官。

original: Has not recruited an Academy Hero in the last 5 years.
translation: 在过去的5年内没有招募过学院英雄。

original: A gladiator-trained warrior appears at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
translation: 一名受过训练的角斗士出现在§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!的宫廷里。

original: This character trained as a Gladiator in the arena.
translation: 这个角色被训练成为了一名角斗士。

original: The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the [the_temple.GetName], they place [From.GetHerHim] on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] on top of the temple, and slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.

The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the top of the [the_temple.GetName] and they keep [From.GetHerHim] steady on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] that stands there while I slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. I then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.
This option is available because you have the §Y[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]§!
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]§!特质

original: A visitor to my court told me that in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName] he heard rumors that a rich merchant had acquired an unheard of [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName].

I received a letter from someone in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName], claiming that he has in his possession a copy of [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. But that work was unknown until now!
I shall ask [possible_emissary1.GetFirstName] to go and try to acquire the book!
translation: 我应该让[possible_emissary1.GetFirstName]去那并且试着拿到那本书！

original: It is interesting news, but right now I have more pressing matters to attend to.
translation: 这是个有趣的消息，但现在我有更要紧的事情处理。

original: I actually do not care about missing books. The collection I have is enough.
translation: 我一点儿都不在乎失踪的书籍。我的收藏品已经够多了。

original: You will no longer be bothered with news about lost books.
translation: 你再也不会因失落之书的消息而烦恼了。

original: My courtier [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] returned today with the sad news that [emissary.GetHeShe] could not obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], and is even not sure it really exists. [emissary.GetFirstName] returned the money that remained after the Journey expenses.
translation: 我的廷臣[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]今天带着不幸的消息回来了。[emissary.GetHeShe]没有得到著名的[Root.GetAuthorNationAdj][Root.GetAuthorTitle][Root.GetAuthorName]的著作[Root.GetBookTheme]，甚至无法确定它是否真的存在。[emissary.GetFirstName]退还了路上花剩下的钱。

original: My Lord [Root.GetTitle]\n I [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick], your humble servant, am still trying to obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. \n Unfortunately I have run out of funds. Would your grace be so generous as to send me some extra money, I am almost sure to be able to find and acquire the book you seek.
I will send the money. It will be worth it!
translation: 我会寄钱过去。这是值得的！

original: No, it is too expensive. Let [emissary.GetHerHim] return empty handed.
translation: 不，这太贵了。让[emissary.GetHerHim]两手空空的回来吧。

original: I just got news that [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is staying in the court of [emissary_current_host.GetTitledNameWithNick] spending my money and with no intent of returning! And the [Root.GetBookTheme] by [Root.GetAuthorName] is nowhere to be found.
Oh no! I must be more careful choosing who to send next time.
translation: 噢不！我下次必须更谨慎地选择派谁去。

original: Maybe somebody will take care of the traitor?
translation: 也许有人会照顾一下这个叛徒？

original: The traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is no longer alive. And nobody will be able to trace [emissary.GetHerHis] death to me.
Curses! The attempt on the life of the traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] failed, and my involvement was discovered.
Nobody betrays me and gets away with it.
translation: 没有人在背叛我以后还能活下来的。

original: Maybe it was not such a good idea.

[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] has returned with the [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName]!\n Maybe I should invite some learned scholars to discuss this precious finding?
translation: [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]带着被认为是由[Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]回来了！\n或许我应该邀请几位饱读诗书的学者来讨论这本珍贵的书籍？

original: I will read the book and see by myself.
translation: 我要独自一人阅读这些书。

original: Let us send letters and invite some scholars
Just announce the discovery and store the book in my library
translation: 仅仅公布发现并把书储存在我的图书馆里

original: You gain the [the_book.GetName] as an artifact.
The Lost Book is a Fake!

A scholar working in my library, [the_whistleblower.GetTitledNameWithNick] is saying that my precious [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] is falsification!\n  I can imprison [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim], but on the other hand a courtier who speaks the truth might be a good person to have around me.

translation: 谁给[the_whistleblower.GetSheHe]的胆子？把那个白痴[the_whistleblower.GetManWoman]抓起来！

original: I will reward [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim] for speaking the truth!
This book seems to be a forgery!
After a careful reading of the [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] I believe it is a forgery. Nevertheless, the contents of the book are actually not bad.
I actually learned something from the book.
translation: 事实上我从这本书里学到了一些东西。

original: Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. The book was considered as a lost masterpiece and my court is famous now as a center of culture, scholarly debate and knowledge.

Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. Unfortunately, after much discussion, the book was considered as a forgery, but my court is famous now as a center for scholarly debate, culture and knowledge.
A center for culture. That sounds good.
Good. And maybe next time I will actually obtain a masterpiece.
translation: 结果不错，也许下次我真的能获得一部杰作呢。

original: A book containing the lost [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName] was acquired and on this date a great meeting of scholars confirmed its authenticity. In those times, [wonder_province.GetName] was known as a place of culture, visited by scholars from afar.
While digging the ground during the building of [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName], the workers came across some kind of door for what seems to be a closed chamber.
translation: 建筑[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]的工人在挖掘过程中偶然发现了某种门，看起来似乎有一间密室。

original: The construction overseer on my [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName] just told me a worker fell in a hole while digging and found some bones. It seems to be some kind of old grave.
translation: 我[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]工地上的监工刚刚报告我在挖掘过程中，一个工人跌进一个洞里，发现了一些骨头。看起来那是某种古老的坟墓。

original: Let us spend some time and gold to investigate.
translation: 让我们花点时间和金钱去研究一下

original: Maybe there are some old valuables inside.\n
translation: 说不定里面有什么值钱的东西\n

original: Just ignore and continue the work.
I do not want to be bothered again with such petty details!
translation: 别再让我为这种细枝末节的东西操心！

original: You will no longer be bothered with news about findings during construction of the great works.\n
translation: 你不会再受到与奇观建筑过程中的发现有关的消息打扰。\n

original: It is probably an ancient tomb. Explore with caution.
translation: 可能是座古墓。小心探索。

original: This option is available because you have either a high Learning, or the traits Erudite or Architect.\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有高学识或者是博学与建筑师特质。\n

original: While the workers were trying to dig there was a cave-in and several men were buried in the debris. And now we need to clear everything.
translation: 工人们试图挖掘的时候发生了塌方，几个人被埋进了废墟里。现在我们得把所有东西清理干净。

original: After a few days digging, all that was found were old bones and broken vases. A waste of time and gold.
translation: 挖了几天之后，找到的只有古人的遗骨与破碎的瓶瓶罐罐。我们的时间和金钱全部白费了。

original: After some digging, a big stone appeared, blocking an entrance. When the workers removed the stone, an old tomb was discovered, with a small quantity of silver and gold objects in it.
translation: 经过一些挖掘，一块阻挡着入口的大石头出现了。当工人们移开石头时，他们发现了一座古墓，里面有少量的黄白之物。

original: The workers found a number of small connected underground chambers under the [wonder_or_upgrade.GetName] construction site with old burial remains, and a fair amount of silver and gold objects!
translation: 工人们在[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]施工现场地下找到了几间相连的墓室，里面有些被埋葬的古人的残余，还有数目可观的黄白之物！

original: The workers dug their way into a large chamber where some old lord was put to rest. In there they found some gold objects and a [found_artifact.GetName].
translation: 工人们一路掘进一座巨大的墓室，里面安息着某位古代的领主。他们在里面找到了一些黄金制品，还有[found_artifact.GetName]。

original: You gain the [found_artifact.GetName] as an artifact.\n
Not giving some compensation to the widows and orphans of the dead workers might give us problems in the future.\n
translation: 如果不去给失去的工人留下的寡妇孤儿些许赔偿的话，我们将来有可能面临麻烦。\n

original: The workers might be upset if they receive nothing.\n
translation: 如果工人们什么都得不到的话。他们会很沮丧。\n

original: Let us give to the workers a share of the gold.
I will keep both the valuables and the [found_artifact.GetName].
Let us distribute the gold to the workers as a reward.
translation: 把黄金发给工人当作报酬吧！

original: We shall give some gold to the families of the victims.
translation: 我们会给遇难者的家人一些钱。

original: The smiths in our own [the_armory.GetName] are capable enough!
translation: 我们自己[the_armory.GetName]里的工匠已经足够了！

original: This option is available because you have a §Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§! with an §Y[the_armory.GetName]§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有包括§Y[the_armory.GetName]§!的§Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§!

original: The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was an armor you wanted right?" he adds.
translation: 城堡里的铁匠献给你一个脏兮兮的旧盒子，看上去他们更习惯于锤制马鞍和头盔，而不是造王室想要的东西。「当当当当！」他紧张地说道，「这就是您想要的盔甲吧？」

original: My master [GetWeaponArmorSmith] came to see me in the throne room. [smith.GetSheHeCap] gestured towards [smith.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [smith.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
I want a heavy two-handed sword.
This sword can only be handled by a strong warrior, but is sure to impress friend and foe alike.
Having a conversation with §Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! in an appropriate place might convince [Root.GetHerHim] to be more supportive.
translation: 与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个合适的地点进行对话也许会使[Root.GetHerHim]更加支持我。

original: You will take §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! near the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! in your §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a talk with [target_character.GetHerHim] about the importance of cooperation.
Has NOT attempted to intimidate a character in the past 2 years[From.GetScaryCD]
translation: 过去的2年里没有威胁一名角色[From.GetScaryCD]

original: - you can try to intimidate a character again on: §Y[This.used_scary_upgrade_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!

I invited [target_character.GetBestName] for a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, while [target_character.GetBestName] grew more and more uncomfortable, before I leaned in to say...

I invited [target_character.GetBestName] on a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, but [target_character.GetSheHe] seemed to be enjoying the view. Then I said...
...'I hope you understand how important this favor is'.
the attempt to coerce a favor fails
...'What do you think of my toy?'.
[target_character.GetBestName] just laughed at me! Laughed really hard. I can still hear his laughs in my dreams.
translation: [target_character.GetBestName]只是在嘲笑我！笑得很过分。我甚至在梦中还能听到他的笑声。

original: Meeting §Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! in a secluded place might be interesting.
translation: 与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个隐蔽的地方会面会很有趣。

original: You will invite §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! to meet you in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a private conversation with [target_character.GetHerHim].
Has NOT invited a character for a private talk in the past §Y6§! months[From.GetSecludedCD]
[From.GetBestName] invited me to meet [From.GetHerHim] in the [target_upgrade.GetName] of the [target_wonder.GetName].
I will politely invent an excuse and refuse.
[target_character.GetBestName] accepted my invitation to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some time talking...
...we will know each other a little better.
I do not know how §Y[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]§! will react if I try to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but we might become lovers.
translation: 我不清楚如果我试着去亲吻§Y[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]§!的话[target_character.GetHerHim]会如何回应，说不定我们就会成为恋人。

original: ...I get my dagger out and try to stab [target_character.GetHerHim] in the heart.
translation: ……我抽出匕首，试图直刺[target_character.GetHerHim]的心脏！

original: This option is available because you have either a high §YIntrigue§! or related traits.\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你高超的§Y阴谋§!技能或相关的特质。\n

original: I better be good at fighting because §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! might resist my murder attempt.
translation: 我最好精于搏斗因为§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!也许会反抗我的谋杀企图。

original: [target_character.GetBestName] [target_character.GetPoliteRefuse] declined my invitation me to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName].
I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. We are having a pleasant conversation.

translation: 令人愉快，但不是很实际。

original: I think [From.GetBestName] was impressed with our conversation.
I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] grabs me and tries to kiss my mouth.
I get my dagger out and try to stab [From.GetHerHim] in the heart!
translation: 我抽出匕首，试图直刺[From.GetHerHim]的心脏！

original: [target_character.GetFirstName] returned my kiss, and more. We became lovers.
translation: [target_character.GetFirstName]更加热烈地回应了我的吻。我们成为了恋人。

original: I tried to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but [target_character.GetSheHe] recoiled from me with disgust and fear on [target_character.GetHerHis] face.
translation: 我试图亲吻[target_character.GetHerHim]，但[target_character.GetSheHe]厌恶地退缩了，在[target_character.GetHerHis]的脸上只有畏惧。

original: I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] pulls a dagger from under [From.GetHerHis] clothes and tries to stab me!
While I approach my face, suddenly [From.GetTitledFirstName] pulls a dagger from under [From.GetHerHis] clothes and tries to stab me!
translation: 当我把脸颊凑上去的时候，[From.GetTitledFirstName]突然从[From.GetHerHis]衣服里掏出一把匕首刺向我！

original: you managing to escape, but wounded.
translation: 你成功逃离了，但受了伤。

original: you being killed while trying to escape.
It was a very bad idea to go meet to meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName]. I barely escaped with my life. My hands still tremble when I think of it.
translation: 与[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[target_upgrade.GetName]的隐蔽处会面实在是糟透了。我好不容易才死里逃生。每当我回想时我的手仍然止不住颤抖。

original: Fortunately [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s dagger missed my heart, and I managed to escape with my life. The physician says I will survive. Let us see.
translation: 幸运的是，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的匕首偏离了我的心脏，我成功逃生了。我的医生说我会活下来的。我们走着瞧。

original: As I see the blood slowly leaving my body, forming a pool on the ground, and the hands of death reaching for me, I now think of all the things I could have done if I knew this day would end like this.
translation: 当我看着血从我的身体中慢慢流淌，在地上形成血泊，死亡之手已向我伸出，我在想，如果早知道今天会发生这样的事我应该做些什么。

original: As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss my mark. Then [From.GetSheHe] just runs away. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.
translation: 正当我的匕首刺向[From.GetHerHis]心脏，[From.GetTitledFirstName]举起手臂，让我扑了空。接着[From.GetSheHe]立刻逃之夭夭。现在我不得不去面对这一后果。

original: As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss the mark. I wound [From.GetHerHim], but [From.GetSheHe] manages to run away, leaving a trail of blood behind. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.
translation: 正当我的匕首刺向[From.GetHerHis]心脏，[From.GetTitledFirstName]举起手臂，让我扑了空。我弄伤了[From.GetHerHim]，但[From.GetSheHe]成功逃跑了，只留下了一滩血迹。现在我不得不面对这一后果了。

original: Before [From.GetSheHe] can run away, I bury my dagger in [From.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] face is frozen in a look of betrayal.
translation: 在[From.GetSheHe]试图逃跑前，我把匕首插入了[From.GetHerHis]胸膛！我让[From.GetTitledFirstName]躺在地上，血泊环绕了[From.GetHerHim]的周身。因为背叛，[From.GetHerHisCap]的表情变得僵硬。

original: We fight each other, but in the end, I prevail and bury my dagger in [From.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我们互相搏斗，但最终我占了上风，我把匕首插入了[From.GetHerHis]胸膛！我让[From.GetTitledFirstName]躺在地上，血泊环绕了[From.GetHerHim]的周身。

original: After many years of tenaciously establishing new borders for our Empire, the time has come to officially declare ourselves the Tsardom of Russia. What a glorious day!
translation: 在为我们的帝国坚持开疆拓土这么多年之后，是时候正式宣告我们是俄罗斯沙皇国了。多么荣耀的一天！

original: After many years of preparation, [From.GetBestName] has chosen to declare complete sovereignty over [From.GetHerHis] vast territories by founding the Tsardom of Russia.
translation: 经过多年的准备，[From.GetBestName]选择了通过建立俄罗斯沙皇国来宣告对[From.GetSheHe]广袤领土的完全统治权。

original: Holding the Empire of Rus is not enough – some are starting to think that 'the Empire of Russia' has a better ring to it...
Lowers the requirements for upgrading Tribal Holdings to Castles
translation: 降低从部落地产升级到城堡的需求

original: "My [Root.GetLordLady], something has been found in the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage]" a scribe catches up with me. "An old book, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]?" When I join [Root.GetHerHim] for a closer inspection, I have to agree with the assessment. "Old indeed", I sneeze. "We should have someone care for it", the scribe suggests.

Upon inspecting the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage], my guards have found [inherited_artifact.GetName], an old weapon. "It must have belonged to [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", they inform me. "Shame it's not in better shape", they mutter.

I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName], a piece of armor, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "I am not sure it's in any wearable condition, my [Root.GetLordLady]" the quartermaster informs me, as I trace the pattern on it with one hand.

I have recently inherited an item from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "It has probably seen better days, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", the guard tells me, before continuing: "We are sorry to bother you with this, we just weren't sure whether to get rid of it or not".
I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName] from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It is not in good shape.
The [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage] currently houses a valuable item I inherited from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It might need someone to look after it though.

"What is it?" I ask the guards. "You have inherited this... [inherited_artifact.GetName]", one of them explains. "From [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", [Root.GetSheHe] continues. "If you want to keep it, we'll store it for you, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. It might need some maintenance though."
I suppose it could be worth something, one day...
For sentimental reasons, I could have someone look it over.
Maintenance is to be expected, I guess.
We cannot put a price on heirlooms like this. Spare no expense!
We cannot afford to maintain all the old junk thrown our way.
A testament to the piety of its builder, the church stretches to the sky.
This building is a testament to the piousness of its builder.
Anyone setting foot in the building will be reminded of the value of a religious community.
The site of the temple is rumored to be the holiest ground in the realm.
A ruler is immortalized in this grand statue.
The fortress is a safe-haven, a home away from home for many warriors.
Partially carved from the very rock it sits on, only its owner knows exactly how far these tunnels sprawl.
A mega-project, this is a construction of massive city walls.
Heavily trafficked, the magnificent Harbor is bringing both trade and tourism to the area.
A tall and visible landmark, the building lends a helping hand to sailors, guiding their ships into port at night.
The epitome of high culture, the amphitheater is a unique attraction in the realm.
A regal symbol of the prestigious lineage of its builder, this palace is one of its kind.
The garden is a marvel of both science and beauty.
A high seat of learning, famous throughout the realm.
A simple tomb is not enough for some rulers.
"Build it taller!", was apparently the last words of its architect.
Huge standing rocks are placed in a grand circle, with an opening towards the east, where the sun rises.
The strangely shaped pyramids have always been there.
The amphitheater has seen many uses throughout the centuries, including gladiatorial and animal fights, and later even serving as market stalls for city merchants.
One of the most beautiful cathedrals on this part of the map.
Some think the rocks were placed by gods. Others say it's pagan superstition, but refuse to go near them.
translation: 一些人觉得这些巨石是由诸神置于此处的，另一些人却说这是原始宗教的迷信，拒绝靠近。
哈利卡那索斯的摩索拉斯陵墓

original: A giant above-ground tomb, constructed by Mausolus, a satrap in the Persian Empire, for himself and Artemisia II of Caria.
translation: 一座巨大的地上坟墓，由波斯帝国的一位总督摩索拉斯，为自己和卡里亚的阿尔特米西亚二世修建。

original: A hill, deeply sacred to Jewish worshipers, as it is said to be the location of the ancient Temple of Solomon.
translation: 一座对犹太教徒而言及其神圣的山丘，据说是古代所罗门圣殿之所在。

original: For a long time the tallest building in the world, the lighthouse is an impressive construction visible from far away, while also serving its purpose, guiding ships into port.
translation: 这个灯塔很长一段时间里都是世界上最高的建筑，处在很远的地方也能见其高高耸立，同时它还一直保有着引船入港的功能。

original: The grand construction in the province has led to many well-connected roads being made in the realm.
A network of watchtowers and garrisons has been founded across the realm.
The armaments surrounding the grand construction display a collection of heads on spikes.
Tends to inspire characters to become §YCruel§!
The tower can be seen from far away.
From an underground furnace, through ducts and vents, warm air is guided through the building.
A complex system of pipes and hot water keeps the floor of the building warm.
A special unit of guards are stationed in the province, heightening security around the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
The ugly creatures sticking out from the facade of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] have an ominous air to them.
translation: 这些从[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]正面探出头的丑陋怪物看起来很不吉利。

original: While intended for ceremony, the bells can also be rung in times of danger, a warning which would be heard all over the province.
translation: 钟不仅可以用于仪式，在发生危险的时候，也能借由它响彻整个省份的响声来发出警告。

original: A beautiful piece of art reflecting a biblical scene.
translation: 描绘着《圣经》中画面的美丽艺术品

original: The arch-headed windows extend to several floors, bestowing the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] with an unparalleled level of grandeur.
While subterranean passageways are a source of fascination, they are primarily a sacred space for religious practice.
translation: 虽然地底的通道是使人着魔的源头，但这里主要还是用作举行宗教仪式的圣地。

original: On top of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a big cross, embellishing the silhouette of the building.
translation: 一个在[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]顶端的巨大十字架，装点了这座建筑的轮廓。

original: The bells of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] have been coated with a thin layer of gold.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]的钟镀上了薄薄的一层黄金

original: The grand statue of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] impresses both faithful and those foreign to the faith of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] guards are especially dedicated to the protection of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
The people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] show their devotion to the gods by sacrificing living beings.
translation: [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的子民向神明献祭活物来展现他们对上帝的奉献。

original: In the middle of the grove, a tree is planted. As time passes, its branches will reach as tall as its roots, representing the connection between worlds.
A secluded series of rooms the Priests and Priestesses can retire to while maintaining communication with the Gods.

An area surrounding the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] has been dedicated to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], and contains smaller buildings and open spaces specifically designed to invite a larger number of worshipers.
A tower attached to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], to announce the call to prayer.
translation: 一座[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]附带的高塔，用以召唤信众礼拜。

original: An open courtyard with a fountain, for performing ablutions and refreshing the faithful.
translation: 一个带喷泉的开放庭院，以供信众沐浴净身和透气。

original: A symbolic representation of the vault of Heaven, the dome surmounts the Qibla wall.
translation: 礼拜墙顶端的圆顶，是苍穹的具象化。

original: Illumination is essential in a [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], as many prayers happen during the night. Hundreds of decorated lamps create a dazzling effect, with a soft light emanating from each one.
Not only for prayer, the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a civic center, caring for those in need.
translation: [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]不仅可以进行礼拜，同时也是照顾穷困的人的市民中心。

original: The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
A hostel, instilling gratitude in many a tired traveler.
translation: 一座在疲惫的旅人间渐渐获得口碑的客栈。

original: The Talmud instructs that the Synagogue should be taller than the other buildings.
translation: 根据《塔木德》，犹太会堂应当比其他建筑物高。

original: By building an outer garden, the faithful can relax before and after the prayers.
The Torah Ark, where the sacred Torah scrolls are stored, are here given the proper importance.
translation: 妥拉柜是存放神圣的妥拉经卷的柜子，意义重大。

original: Elaborate decorations will help elevate the spirit of the faithful to the heavens.
The acoustics of these rooms make them suited for practice singing.
The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
An extensive library, for housing relevant manuscripts while also providing a quiet study area for the scholar in need of it.
The sun reflects most brilliantly in the surface of this statue.
The moon reflects beautifully in the surface of this statue.
These beautiful statues are said to resemble the immediate family of [Root.GetTitledName].
A stable containing horses, but most importantly, the ones descending from the original chosen creature depicted in the grand monument rising above the roof of this building.
The original statue is surrounded by smaller statues, depicting critters of various kinds.
translation: 原本的雕塑由描绘着多种动物的稍小一些的雕像围绕着

original: The piers expand the harbor and how much trade that can be conducted there.
The installation of a proper Harbor office has led to better control of the trade coming and going through the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
For guiding ships in and out of the harbor.
An area set aside for construction of the navy.
The long-gone relatives of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can be found standing witness to the passing of time, in the dark corridors of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
A massive undertaking allowing the stage to be filled with water for mock naval battles.
Allows for battles with exotic beasts, imported from distant lands.
translation: 为斗兽而留，这些野兽是从遥远的异域进口来的。

original: An attachment to the Amphitheater, for races.
translation: 圆形剧场的附带建筑，用于赛马。

original: An academy to train the fighters who fight in the amphitheater
A place for chariots to practice and race each other.
translation: 一个用来练习战车和互相切磋的场地。

original: A stage, specifically designed for dramatic readings of poetry and acting.
translation: 为诗朗诵和表演特意设计的舞台

original: Beautiful fountains, attracting small birds, adding to the atmosphere.
translation: 美丽的喷泉，可以吸引小鸟，增添情调。

original: There is an eerie sheen to the water in this well...
translation: 这个井中的水闪烁着怪异的光泽......

original: A marvelous terraced solution to one section of the garden.
A place for hiding. Or romance.
translation: 用来躲迷藏的地方。或者用来做一些浪漫的事。

original: The sweet smell of flowers and thick undergrowth can hide the darkest of secrets...
translation: 芬芳的花朵与茂盛的灌木足以隐藏最黑暗的秘密……

original: Delightful, but deadly, the flowers in this garden carry some powerful properties.
translation: 花园里的花朵具备一些强大的毒性，这使它们美丽而致命，

original: A well-organized patch of land, showing the dedication of its carer.
translation: 这块土地井井有条，体现了它园丁的辛勤奉献。

original: These elegant statues depict people relaxing, presumably to inspire calm in anyone visiting the garden.
The crown has begun to reserve choice areas and the finest forests in the land for royal hunting trips. Though some grumble, this is widely seen to be simply the monarch's due.
translation: 王室开始占据优质的地块和上好的林地，用以王室狩猎活动。虽然有些许的人会发牢骚，但这被广泛视为君主应有的权利。

original: More than mere hunting preserves, these lands are the private playground of the monarch, and include valuable economic areas.
translation: 这些土地不仅仅是狩猎保护区，也是君主的私人游乐场，其中包含了很多有经济价值的区域。

original: Entire towns are subsumed by this kingdom-within-a-kingdom, and prosperous villages often find that the monarch's men have "discovered" maps placing their settlements firmly inside the nearest royal forest.
translation: 城镇被整个纳入国中之国，繁荣的村庄时常发现他们的居所在王室官吏的地图上，赫然被列进最近的王家狩猎场中。

original: The royal forests now cover over a third of the country, more than the lords, burghers, or clergy individually, and more than the rest of the monarchs' domains in their entirety. It is truly the fourth estate of the realm.
translation: 王家狩猎场现在占了全国的三分之一，比领主、市民和神职人员的地都多，也比君王自己其他所有的直辖领地加起来都多。这真成了国家的第四等级了。

original: Like the new forest, a huge area is designated a kingswood and cleared of the local peasantry.
translation: 一大片区域被划归成王室猎场，当地农民被清扫得一干二净，如同一片新的森林一般。

original: A separate legal system for the royal forests that, where necessary, supersedes the common law of the land.
translation: 一个为王家狩猎场单独设立的法律系统，必要的时候会取代当地的普通法。

original: Law is only as good as the system that backs it up, and now the royal forests have an entire system of courts, wardens, and clerks, backed up by trained magistrates, all ready to enforce the diktats of the crown.
translation: 法律只有通过制度的保障才能生效，现在王家狩猎场拥有了一整套包括法院、看守、书记的制度，在训练有素的治安法官的支持下，他们随时准备着执行王室的法令。

original: Residents of the royal forest have the rights to local mineral deposits, in exchange for their services in war-time.
translation: 王家狩猎场内的居民对当地的矿藏有权开采，他们可以此免于服役。

original: Royal metalworks, royal armories, royal shipwrights, royal carpentries. If it's skilled and in the kingwoods, it belongs to the crown.
translation: 王家冶金厂、王家兵工厂、王家造船厂、王家木工坊。凡是在王室猎场内有技术的工匠，全都属于王室。

original: Reserve and cultivate ship-building timber for sale to your merchants, with the proviso that ships owe a certain amount of service to their lord.
translation: 保留和培育造船用的木料，用来卖给你的商人，附带的条件是造出来的船只需要为其领主提供一定的服务。

original: Establish a ministry that regularly beats the bounds of the royal forests, determining exactly where the edges lay, and pushing them outwards every now and then.
translation: 建立一个部门，定期勘查王家狩猎场的边界，探知边线的具体所在，时不时地还能把这个边界向外扩张一点。

original: Legalize small freeholders to patrol the borders of the kingwoods, in exchange for plots of land from which they can do it.
translation: 让自由保有地产者巡逻王室猎场的边境，作为他们换取对自己份地享有自由保有权的合法依据。

original: Agisters regulate both agistment and pannage, two of the major money-making abrogations for a royal forest. The organizations is not entirely unlike an extra layer of tax stations.
translation: 代牧人既控制着牧牛费，又控制着牧猪费，这两项费用是王家狩猎场最赚钱的排他权。这个机构有点像个额外的收税站。

original: The expansion of crown privileges at the expense of the local populace causes a certain amount of petty discontent with the crown, leading to mild negative events violating forest law.
translation: 王室特权的扩张是以牺牲民众利益为代价的，民众对王室有了一定程度的非议，导致了一些轻微违反王室猎场法的负面事件出现。

original: Reckless expansion of crown privileges continues to infuriate the people who actually live on the land, giving more severe negative events.
translation: 王室特权无度的扩张继续激怒着赖这片土地维生的人，这造成了些更为严重的负面事件。

original: With the most recent advance of the royal forest, the crown's powers are unprecedented. Peasants, clergy, and barons alike all chafe sorely against the start of the perceived-birth of an absolutist monarchy, and a dramatic revolt is sure to follow.
translation: 随着王家狩猎场新近的扩大，王室获得了空前的势力。农民、神职人员和贵族们都不约而同地察觉到这是君主专制诞生的开端，对此他们异常恼怒。一场戏剧性的叛乱定将接踵而至。

original: The dramatic revolts of the past are surely over with the signing of this Great Charter.
translation: 过去戏剧性的叛乱确实随着《大宪章》的签署彻底结束了。

original: An expansion to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], providing ample storage for armor and weaponry.
A tower increasing the line of sight, and safety, for the entire province.
A special vault, deep in the heart of the fortress, for storage and safe-keeping.
A deep trench surrounds this fortress.
translation: 要塞周围环绕着深深的壕沟

original: At least one craftsman died in the making of this moat.
translation: 至少有一名工匠在制造这些尖刺时不幸去世

original: Water keeps people at bay. Unless they can swim.
translation: 水能使敌人难以接近，除非他们会游泳。

original: A frightening sight, the moat is said to contain all that remains of those who have personally slighted [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 这景象令人恐惧。据说这条「护城河」里面是所有那些胆敢怠慢[Root.GetTitledFirstName]之人的遗体

original: A labyrinthine network of tunnels and passageways are said to exist within and under the walls of [FromFrom.GetName].
translation: 据说[FromFrom.GetName]的墙壁里与地下隐藏着一座由地道与走廊交织而成的迷宫

original: Within the walls of the fortress is a small and tranquil garden, serving as a place for the world-weary warrior to recharge his energy.
A room dedicated to the practice of one-on-one combat.
translation: 用于一对一决斗训练的房间

original: A secret vault, for storing particularly valuable merchandise.
translation: 秘密地窖，用于储存那些尤为宝贵的商品。

original: A reinforced building structure, designed to prevent damage from earthquakes.
There can be no doubt as to who is the owner of this building.
A marvel of engineering, this flame is bigger and lasts longer than others.
translation: 一个工程学的奇迹，火焰比别处更大，燃烧也更持久。

original: There is one person who is ultimately in charge of the lighthouse maintenance. At least on paper.
translation: 有一个人掌管灯塔的维护工作。至少在纸面上。

original: In case of an important guest, the Royal Apartments will provide the level of comfort expected by any sophisticated ruler.
A series of impressive natural hollows, these rooms are only partially improved upon by human engineering.
These tunnels are hard to navigate, but those with the necessary maps are high-ranking soldiers in need of expedient travel.
In the depths of the underground complex, workers have encountered valuable ore, which is now being carefully excavated.
A wooden floor hatch, conveniently located right in front of the royal throne, sends a message to any belligerent visitor.
In memory of beloved family members, the stones show intricate patterns and markings, inspiring deep respect for its craftsmen.
These works reveal the human soul, the meaning of love, and the tragedy of life.
The secrets of building great edifices, roads, and bridges are revealed in the classical works of Vitruvius and other recent authors.
Manuscripts recording the known history of modern civilization and warfare.
By reading what many others observed of the world and creatures that live in it we may gain precious knowledge. Is the world actually flat?
From the works of Plato, to the most recent treatises on mathematics.
A room full of scribes, who receive works from all over the world and make copies of them.
Outside of the main [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] two smaller, yet similar, monuments can be found. They are said to be resting place of the ones most dear to [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Perhaps a monument to [Root.GetTitledName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself], the statue is mostly reminiscent of a famous beast.
These rooms do not appear to be a part of the original plans for the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]...
Within the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], surrounded by silence and the passing of time, there is a whole underground city for the dead.
Considering the pyramid is a lot like a giant sign proclaiming where to find valuables, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is rumored to have designed a number of intricate traps to scare off grave-robbers.
The surface of this pyramid is exceptionally smooth, and when it reflects the sun, it sometimes looks like it is emitting a light of its own.
translation: 金字塔的表面罕见地光滑，能直接反射日光，有时看起来仿佛是金字塔自己在发光。

original: Two gigantic Cherubim made out of cedar wood, their outstretched wings touching in the middle of the Holy Place.
The outer court is used by the population for worship
as long as anyone can remember
inspired many pious men and women
eased the burden of every day life for countless people
improved the lives of its residents
encouraged greatness in both commoner and noble alike
[This.GetName] sends chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
[This.GetName] send chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
[This.GetName] promises safety in times of need
[This.GetName] are said to guarantee its safety, in times of need
stone [This.GetName] are said to keep demons at bay
grand dome is a second sky for its worshipers

The [target_wonder.GetName] has become a center for travelers and commerce, and some people have decided to settle close to the [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction. The latest reports mention children, dogs, and cattle — they are obviously putting down deep roots.
They are welcome to stay in [target_province.GetName]!
Drive out the rabble and confiscate their possessions!

My scribes have been frequenting the [target_wonder.GetName] during their toil to finish my book. As they present me with a new extract it is clear that it has been a great help – the quality of the text is beyond reproach!
My scribes will shine with this [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction's help!
You encourage your scribes to use the [target_wonder.GetName], guaranteeing a better quality of work
Drink from the Fountain of Youth
The life-giving waters of the fountain is said to be able to wash away the effects of aging in anyone who drinks it.
translation: 这泉水据说有给予人生命，洗净衰老的功效。

original: Drank too recently — cannot drink it again until §Y[Root.drank_from_fountain_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 最近才饮用——在§Y[Root.drank_from_fountain_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!之前无法再饮用

original: Unlocks the §YDrink from the Fountain of Youth§! decision
translation: 解锁§Y饮用青春之泉§!的决议

original: I jump into the [target_wonder.GetName], laughing with glee, and I am soon choking on the life-giving water as I swallow mouthful after mouthful. As I drag myself up onto the ledge with shaking arms I soon stop smiling...
translation: 我欢笑着纵身跃入[target_wonder.GetName]，我一口接一口地咽下这长生之水，差点没把我呛着。当我用颤抖的双臂爬上岸边的岩石时，我的笑意很快消失了......

original: The years fall off me as I drink.
translation: 年华被我从身上喝走了。

original: I've never felt this old before!
translation: 我以前从没觉得自己有这么老！

original: This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves responsible and can be entrusted with the care of your lighthouse – keeping it both lit and functioning.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位已经展现出责任心，并可以被委托照看灯塔的人物——责任包括保持它的燃烧以及正常运转。
解锁§Y灯塔托管人§!的荣誉头衔

original: Steady as a rock, and with immovable discipline, the custodian is responsible for the care of the stones.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Stone§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves steadfast in their loyalty and discipline.
The colossal monoliths of this construction already inspire both awe and admiration – imagine the impact of even more stones!
A crown made of pure gold encircles the magnificent head of the statue.
Anyone seeking passage through this area will be sternly encouraged to donate a small sum to the crown.
A dedicated place for your beloved horses to rest forever more.
A quiet and serene place for all pets to find eternal rest.

Blue indicates realms that are within diplomatic range of the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Green indicates realms that have a peace treaty with the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Purple indicates realms that are paying tribute to the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!.
Red indicates the realm of the §Y[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle]§!.
§Y[This.GetName]§! is being built and is of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
§Y[This.GetName]§! is not being built or is not of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!
A feature is being built for §Y[This.GetName]§!
A feature is not being built for §Y[This.GetName]§!
§Y[This.GetName]§! has been built and is of type §Y$WONDER_TYPE$§!

Best not to ask too many questions, lest you end up here.
translation: 不想死的话就别问太多问题

original: A throne made of skulls and bones, supported by a frame of iron.
translation: 用骷髅与白骨堆砌成的王座，以铁架支撑。

original: A throne made entirely of gold, not even gilded, just completely gold. What a waste.
translation: 通体由黄金打造的宝座，甚至没有镀金，就是纯金打造。真是浪费啊。

original: A brewery to create your own alcohol. While unlikely to turn a profit, it might make you popular.
translation: 一间能让你自行生产酒的酿酒厂。尽管它不太可能赢利，却可以使你变得受欢迎。

original: Send [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a [GetAlcoholContainerType] of [GetAlcoholType] brewed in your own brewery
translation: 将你酿酒厂里生产的一[GetAlcoholContainerType][GetAlcoholType]赠予[Root.GetTitledFirstName]作为礼物

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has not recently sent a gift of alcohol.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]最近并没有送过酒水类礼物

original: A place to grow grapes and make them into wine.
translation: 种葡萄并用葡萄酿酒的地方

original: An incredibly ostentatious bedroom, fit for nobility.
A beautiful mural depicting a scene from the history of your dynasty.
translation: 描绘着你家族历史中一幕的壁画

original: The Eternal Flame is constantly tended, to ensure it never goes out.
It is unclear who these tombs were made for, but rumor has it you can sometimes hear voices from within.
translation: 我们不清楚这是谁的墓地，但据传言，你有时能听见从里面传出声音。
改革尊日神教信徒好感

original: This statue depicts four horses pulling a chariot.
translation: 这座雕像表现了四匹马拉着一辆战车。

original: A prayer hall that surrounds the stupas.
A descendant of the sacred tree in under which Siddhartha Gautama, the spiritual teacher who became known as the Buddha, attained enlightenment.
translation: 乔达摩·悉达多在这棵圣树的祖先的树荫下悟道，他是以佛陀之名为世人所知的精神导师。

original: The shelter and living quarters for the Buddhist Monks who live here.
translation: 佛教僧侣栖身立命之所。

original: A school where Buddhist teachings are taught.
This is where the remains of Buddha and his disciples are interred.
translation: 这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。

original: This is where the objects belonging to Buddha and his disciples are interred.
translation: 这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。

original: Built to commemorative events in lives of Buddha and his disciples.
translation: 为纪念佛陀及其弟子的生平事迹而建造。

original: Walls specifically added to defend from sea attacks.

The city's defenses have begun to spill out onto the land, with ropes of well-maintained walls crisscrossing the main approach to the burgh. Adding extra bastions to these will bulge the amount of walkable perimeter (and so how many troops can man them) without noticeably increasing cost.

A city is nothing without its countryside, and this city takes that seriously. Vital local townships are now guarded by their own fortifications, paid for and maintained by the capital-settlement, and the closest are even connected by short walls to form a single, defensible sprawl.

These dire, imposing stoneworks punch upwards like massive, artificial fists. Crowned with rows of bastions and studded with fortified towers, none may approach without being seen, and no amount of lesser walls captured will stop the enfilading from their legions of archers.

Secreted behind sewer shafts, diving under the moats, cut into the side of obscuring bastions: the defenders of this city strike often and without warning from their many and varied hiding places, before vanishing back into the night.
Turn each gatehouse into a full-scale fortress in its own right, and so turn each layer of the walls into a separate mini-siege.

Planned routes through the defenses that are simple, clear, devoid of cover, and looked over by the maximum possible number of defenses, always with a difficult fortress guarding the next killing ground along.
Adapt and reshape areas of the defenses to be especially vulnerable to attack from the next layer, turning losses for the defenders into massacres for the attackers.
Redirect local rivers and channel defensive islands out of the sea itself, adding a naval element to any siege that few attackers are equipped to deal with.
Allows more options when §YFinding a Smith§!.
Bells that once stood on a Christian Cathedral.
A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God.
translation: 一座象征神体、神座和神之居所的神庙。

original: A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God. It is a sign of its builder §YKarma§! and §YPrestige§!, and can also influence the opinion of some of your subjects.
translation: 一座象征神体、神座和神之居所的神庙，是其建造者§Y善业§!和§Y威望§!的体现，也会影响到臣民对你的好感。

original: An richly ornate high tower that serves as an entrance to the temple.
translation: 一座富丽堂皇的高塔，是通向神庙的入口。

original: A great pillared hall serving as the waiting room for pilgrims and devotees.
translation: 一座带廊柱的大厅，供朝圣者和信徒在此休息等候。

original: A complex of smaller temples, surrounding the main temple.
translation: 环绕主神庙的小型神庙建筑群。

original: A school, that also provides lodging for students and scholars.
translation: 一座学校，同时也为学生和学者提供住宿。

original: A hospital attached to the temple.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its bells can even warn the people of danger.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can help convert the infidels to the true faith, improve opinion, or even help protect the population from diseases.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can also help improve opinion of you, the morale of the military forces, and reduce revolt risk.
A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder, the temple can improve your subjects' opinion of you, and lower revolt risk.
A testament to the §YKarma§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its walls can protect the people from danger.
Immortalizing a ruler in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from your family and vassals.
Immortalizing a horse in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from horse loving vassals.
An imposing construction, it will make the province much harder to conquer. Added Facilities can improve considerably the military capabilities of its owner.
Building an underground city can increase your intrigue capabilities and you can even find a precious metal deposit.
translation: 通过建造地下城市，你能提升自己的密谋能力，甚至还能找到贵金属的矿床。

original: The construction of massive city walls and other defensive structures will surely protect the province against besieging enemy armies.
translation: 巨大的城墙与其他防御建筑的建造无疑将从围城敌军手下保护省份。

original: A Great Harbor with storehouses will dominate trade in the area, thus bringing revenues. It can also increase our maritime military capabilities, including in sieges.
Illuminating the darkness and guiding ships to the safety of your port, the Lighthouse can increase trade and tax revenues. It can even be used as a place for you to rest.
translation: 灯塔可以照亮黑暗，把船只引导到你安全的港口，它能提升贸易收入与税收，甚至还能用做你的休息之处。

original: An epitome of popular culture, it serves to entertain with great spectacles, lowering the revolt risk. It can also allow for the recruitment of specially trained individuals.
translation: 流行文化的缩影，靠优秀的表演娱乐大众，降低叛乱风险，也包含招募受过专业训练的人才的功能。

original: A regal symbol of the Prestigious lineage of its builder, it can also be equipped with a number of facilities that help the builder with their love life or court intrigue.
translation: 建造者广受尊敬的家系的豪华象征，可以在其上建造多种设施，它们将在爱情生活或宫廷阴谋上给予建造者帮助。

original: The garden will be a marvel of both science and beauty, and can help you with matters related to §YHealth§!, love life, or even intrigue.
translation: 花园将是科学与美学双重意义上的奇迹，能在与§Y健康§!，爱情生活，甚至是密谋相关的事务上给予你帮助。

original: A great place of learning will help with §YCultural§! and other technological advances. The presence of so many learned persons can even increase your personal §YSkills§!.
translation: 学术圣地将在§Y文化§!与其他科技的进步上提供帮助。如此多的饱学之士的存在甚至能提升你的§Y个人能力§!。

original: A place to collect, store and reproduce the great written works, it will allow you to find and use many books.
translation: 搜集、储存与复制优秀书籍的地方，它允许你寻找与利用许多书籍。

original: A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, it is a place to honor the dead. It can also be used to intimidate friends and foes alike.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help improve opinion of you and even help protect your treasures.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can also help  improve your subjects's opinion of you.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help  improve opinion of you, help protect your treasures, and can even be used for sacrifices to the Gods.

translation: 不，可能这并不是个好主意。

translation: 突然，一片漆黑，一个强有力的声音在你脑中回响：「你干了什么？」接下来，闪电击中了你，你感到一阵剧痛，周围的世界在慢慢散去。你最后想的是……

original: I hope my successor does not do the same mistake.
translation: 希望我的继承人别犯同样的错误。

I post guards so that nobody interferes.

The §Y[From.GetName]§! is now nothing but rubble, its former glory lost forever. And I got [global_loot.GetValue] gold from it.

Lively conversations, flowing drinks, and a warm fire – there is no better place to relax after a long day!
translation: 这里有充满活力的对话，供人畅饮的饮品，还有一团温暖的火——想在漫长的一天过后休息，没有比这更好的地方了！
可能会使你缓解§Y紧张不安§!

original: Warm light, accompanied by the lively murmur of conversation, spills out of the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] as [drinking_buddy.GetTitledName] and I walk past.\n\n"What do you say about a cup of something soothing?"
translation: [target_wonder.GetName]旁边的酒馆泛出温和的灯光，伴随着活跃的低语，[drinking_buddy.GetTitledName]和我恰好从旁走过。\n\n「要不整上一杯能解忧的东西？」

original: There might be consequences to this
translation: 这恐怕会有什么不好的后果吧

original: I am more interested in continuing our discussion.
translation: 我对继续我们刚才的谈话更感兴趣。

original: After my initial visit to the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have not been able to keep away. More often than not I find myself seeking the comfort of a big cup of [GetAlcoholType] after a long day.
translation: 自从第一次进了[target_wonder.GetName]旁的酒馆后，我便再难脱身。我往往发觉自己终日都在寻求大杯[GetAlcoholType]带来的慰藉。

original: The retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
The temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
Due to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great Martial ability, the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§! have been rounded up and executed!

Thanks to the retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.

Thanks to the temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.
Thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.

I kneel beside a fountain in the [target_wonder.GetName] and lower a cup into the water. As I drink deeply a tingling sensation spreads in my whole body, and I am left with energy and vigor I haven't felt in years!
translation: 我跪倒在[target_wonder.GetName]的水边，伏身舀了一杯水。我一口饮下，一阵颤栗传遍周身，我浑身充满了久违多年的激情和活力。

original: May kill anyone who tries to conquer the [FromFrom.GetName]

Word has reached me that the traps I installed in the depths of the [target_wonder.GetName] have claimed [target_courtier.GetTitledName] and [target_courtier_2.GetTitledName] as victims! Apparently they were both mangled almost past recognition.

original: Unlocks the §YMaster of the Games§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y竞技大师§!的荣誉头衔

original: This honorific is awarded to a person with a strong personality and presence, capable of bending a whole crowd to their will.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位拥有强大人格和存在感，有能力使整个人群服从他们意志的人物。

original: With nerves of steel and a will of iron the custodian maintains and develops the §YRoyal Palace§!.
This honorific is awarded to a person who has proven themselves dependable, and they are responsible for the upkeep and maintenance of the §YRoyal Palace§!.
translation: 这个称号被授予一位可靠的人物——责任包括§Y王宫§!的维护与保养

original: Responsible for everything inside the §YUniversity's§! walls, this title brings with it both gravitas and responsibility.
Unlocks the §YGuardian of Knowledge§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown their wisdom and courage.
From old ledgers covered in dust to newly minted pages – all written text needs someone to care for it.
Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Tomes§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown great aptitude for learning and all related skills.
Appointed as the one responsible for the eternal rest of the dead in the mausoleum is the Keeper of the Dead.
translation: 守墓人被指派了保卫陵墓中死者的长眠的职责。

original: Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Dead§! minor title
translation: 解锁§Y守墓人§!的荣誉头衔

original: The Keeper of the Dead is responsible for the final rest of everyone placed in the §YMausoleum§!.
Appointed as the one with ultimate authority over all rites executed within the pyramid's walls the Overseer of Rites carry both authority and responsibility upon their shoulders.
Unlocks the §YOverseer of the Rites§! minor title
The Overseer of Rites is responsible for all rites and rituals related to the §YPyramid§!.
As the authority on all daily business and rituals, the Custodian of the Mosque is heeded by all.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Mosque§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
As the authority on all daily business and rituals the Custodian of the Temple is heeded by all.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Temple§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].

[target_vassal.GetTitledName], I want to express my admiration and satisfaction in your handling of the [target_wonder.GetName]!

Sincerely,
[target_liege.GetBestName]
It's all due to your guidance, my liege.
I have done good, haven't I!

My liege, the [target_wonder.GetName] is bringing prosperity and fame to the area, and I am grateful that you entrusted such a magnificent structure to my province.

Sincerely,
[target_vassal.GetBestName]
A piece of the [target_wonder.GetName] has fallen off – almost hitting a bystander in the head! Certain areas of the magnificent structure seem to be in dire need of upkeep.
Repairs will be started at once!
Hm, I bet these pieces would fetch a decent price...
This honorific is awarded to a vassal that is held in high regard by their liege. As Castellan they are responsible for the maintenance and daily ongoings of the Fortress.
translation: 这个称号被授予领主所敬重的封臣。堡主负责城堡的维护和日常运转。

original: A courtier named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.
A courtier named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.

The soothing sounds of the [target_wonder.GetName] embrace me as I walk through the greenery. Reportedly some local herbs have sprouted in the garden, but a secluded patch of grass present an alternative end to this excursion.
A restful nap is exactly what I need!
The temple is a holy building, a place of devotion and reflection.
Built to symbolize different aspects of Buddhist theology.
translation: 为象征佛教理论的不同方面而建造。

original: Built to gain spiritual benefits, or to commemorate visits.
translation: 为获得精神上的裨益或纪行而建造。

As I retired to my [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber], I was shocked to find a copy of [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] of [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith on my bed! At first, I thought someone had left it there with the intention to frame me, but then I noticed a little note left on top of the open tome. 'I think you will find this interesting. Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.

Pyramids were built many years ago by the ancients, we too should aspire to such lofty heights.
translation: 金字塔很久很久以前由古人所建，我们也应当追求如它一般的高度。

original: §GIndependent lieges of this religion can construct pyramids§!
translation: §G此宗教的独立领主可以建造金字塔§!

original: By some complex machinery this throne can raise itself up and down at will.
translation: 通过一些复杂的机械装置，这个宝座现在可以自如的上下移动。

original: A place for the nobility to meet, dance and scheme at feasts
translation: 贵族们在宴会中会面、跳舞和密谋的地方

original: We should hold it in the Grand Amphitheater!
This option is available as you own a §YGrand Amphitheater§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有一座§Y圆形剧场§!。

original: This option is available as you own the §YAnimal Cages§! feature

This great work has taken damage from an earthquake and has not been repaired.
This great work has taken damage from an earthquake and has not been repaired.

You will set aside funds to repair the damage on the lighthouse removing the negative features.
This temple was built in the form of a giant ornamented chariot dedicated to the Sun God, Surya.
translation: 这座神庙被设计成太阳神苏利耶战车的形状。

original: The great desert city of Petra has existed for hundreds of years
translation: 佩特拉沙漠古城已经存在了数个世纪之久

original: A grand library, housing much of the world's knowledge.
translation: 一座大图书馆，世间万物之理皆藏于馆中。

original: The palace of the Pope himself, sitting at the heart of Rome.
translation: 教宗本人的宫殿，坐落于罗马的心脏地带。

original: A grand statue of a majestic stallion!
A magnificent throne, much grander than any simple metal chair.

Only the independent ruler of the realm is allowed to restore Great Works
The up front cost of $COST$¤cannot be paid
A sacred and reserved space inside the temple where only the high ranking priests can enter.
Two pillars of bronze frame the entrance to the temple, bidding all worshipers welcome.
translation: 用两根青铜柱作门框的神殿入口，招徕信众的朝拜。

original: Cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, all overlaid with gold, are carved into the cedar-lined walls. The floor is of cypress overlaid with gold. The door posts, of olive wood, support folding doors of cypress.
The inner sanctuary within the temple. It is located in the westernmost end of the temple building, a perfect cube, prepared to contain the Ark of the Covenant.
translation: 圣殿内部的圣所，位于圣殿的最西端，构造呈完美的立方形，其中存放着约柜。

original: The Inner Court, or Court of the Priests, is separated from the space beyond by a wall of three courses of hewn stone, surmounted by cedar beams. It contains the Altar of burnt-offering, the Brazen Sea laver, and ten other lavers.
A large hall where famous scholars can give public lectures, attracting many attendees.
The intricate arts of negotiation, rhetoric, and ultimately convincing others of where their best interests lie are taught and practiced here.
translation: 这里教授复杂的谈判技巧和修辞学，操练如何去说服他人，晓以大利。

original: Here the classic works on history and ancient wars are taught and discussed, as well as old and new treatises on the art of warfare.
translation: 这里教授经典的历史著作，研讨古代战争，也涉及古今的兵法论著。

original: The principles of accounting, finance, and economics are taught here.
translation: 这里教授会计、财务和经济学的原理。

original: From what plants to use for making deadly concoctions to the art of cipher, all that a budding spy needs to know is taught here.
translation: 这里教授一个初出茅庐的间谍必备的知识，从使用植物制作致死药剂到密码的技艺。

original: Here the foundations of logic and mathematics are taught, as well as physics, metaphysics, and the scriptures.
translation: 这里教授逻辑和数学的基础，同时也教授物理学、形而上学以及宗教经典。

original: splendid [This.GetName] draw[This.GetSingularS] a lot of attention
